detox.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: special treatment to help people stop drinking alcohol or taking drugs
detox.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She spent a month in detox.
detox.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: when you do not eat solid food or only drink special liquids for a period of time, which is thought to remove harmful substances from your body
detox.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if someone detoxes, they are given special treatment at a hospital to help them stop drinking alcohol or taking drugs
detox.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to not eat solid food or only drink special liquids for a period of time, which is thought to remove harmful substances from your body
